awareness_hub.title: Indian Market Awareness Course
awareness_hub.description: Confidence ke saath Indian market ko navigate karein. Ek 3-level course jo fundamentals se strategic insights tak le jayega.
awareness_hub.level_1_description: Indian market ke essentials ke saath ek strong base banayein.
awareness_hub.level_2_description: India mein operate karne ki बारीकियों ko samjhein.
awareness_hub.level_3_description: Long-term success ke liye advanced strategies master karein.

foundation.title: Level 1: Foundation - The Essentials
foundation.description: Indian market mein apni journey shuru karein. Yeh foundational lessons aapko India ke complex aur dynamic environment ko samajhne ke liye zaroori basic knowledge denge.
foundation.module_1_description: India ki economy aur society ki badi picture ko samajhna.
foundation.cultural_diversity: Cultural Diversity: Ek Desh, Kai Sanskritiyan
foundation.module_2_description: India mein business karne ke key aspects.
foundation.ease_of_doing_business: Ease of Doing Business: Myth vs. Reality
foundation.indian_contracts: Indian Contracts ke Bhool Bhulaiyaa ko Navigate Karna
foundation.module_3_description: Sabse important person ko samajhna: aapka customer.
foundation.winning_trust: Kam-Trust wali Society mein Trust Jeetna

professional.title: Level 2: Professional - Navigating the Nuances
professional.description: Yeh level unke liye hai jinko Indian market ki basic samajh hai aur woh operational aur strategic challenges mein gehrai se jaana chahte hain.
professional.module_4_description: Legal aur bureaucratic landscape mein ek-gehri-dubki.
professional.ease_of_doing_business: Ease of Doing Business: Myth vs. Reality
professional.indian_contracts: Navigating the Labyrinth of Indian Contracts
professional.module_5_description: Diverse aur badalte Indian consumer ko samajhna.
professional.digital_native: The Rise of the Digital Native
professional.winning_trust: Winning Trust in a Low-Trust Society
professional.module_6_description: India mein apne business ko successfully launch aur scale karne ki strategies.
professional.supply_chain: Supply Chain & Logistics: The Final Frontier
